title: Lucasfilm Games is the Future of Star Wars - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.11.21
description:
Blessing and Tim kick off the week by talking about what Lucasfilm Games means for Star Wars and more.

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:: - Housekeeping
For some reason, this Wednesday at 9pm pt we’re doing a Signs Watch-a-long party. It’ll be my first time watching Signs. All you need if you want to join in is Amazon prime and you can come and hang out with us on Twitch.tv/kindafunnygames.
Thank you to our Patreon Producer: Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:00:52 - What’s next for Star Wars video games?
00:11:18 - WB has entirely redesigned Gotham Knights' combat for co-op - Vikki Blake @ Eurogamer
The Nano Biologis
00:18:25 - The Cyberpunk hits keep coming: A Polish competition watchdog is investigating CD Projekt - Marie Dealesandri @ GiBiz
00:25:30 - Awesome Games Done Quick 2021 raises $2.75m - Marie Dealesandri @ GiBiz
00:30:10 - Ghost of Tsushima Fans Help With Real-Life Tsushima Island Repairs - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:34:44 - Ads
00:39:46 - Some Square news!
00:42:15 - The new Pulse Red Xbox controller looks HOT
00:44:25 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:46:35 - What do you guys want in a Switch Pro? - Jake Bogdonoff (Bog-Don-Off)
00:51:00 - Squad Up:Brandon(PSN) - grimreaper91352
00:51:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Imran
